entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
